about_the_game:
Cozy Cooking: Lo-fi Beats is a casual, anime-inspired cooking simulation where you can relax, personalize, and immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted 3D world. Prepare your favorite meals in real-time, taking just as long as they would in your own kitchen, all while enjoying a peaceful atmosphere filled with lo-fi beats and soothing ASMR soundscapes. Whether you're customizing your kitchen, cooking a comforting meal, or simply gazing at serene views outside your window, the game offers the perfect balance of relaxation and creativity. With no rush, no pressure, and an environment designed to help you unwind, it's more than just a cooking game—it's your personal retreat.


Real-Time Cooking

Each dish takes the same amount of time to cook as it does in real life, allowing you to fully engage with the process and savor every moment of your culinary creations. As you follow along, you’ll not only enjoy the experience but also pick up real-world cooking techniques, helping you learn and perfect recipes you can try at home.

Customizable Kitchen

Design your dream kitchen with a wide range of customization options. Change colors, appliances, and decor to create a space that feels uniquely yours. Add practical kitchen appliances—like blenders, coffee machines, or toasters—to enhance your setup, making both the design and functionality of your kitchen a true reflection of your style.

Personalized Character

Customize your character's appearance, choosing from a range of outfits and accessories to make your avatar as stylish as your kitchen.

Lo-fi Music & ASMR Soundscapes

Enjoy the relaxing sounds of lo-fi beats mixed with calming, natural ASMR soundscapes, perfect for creating a soothing background as you cook and relax.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 380 with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon RX 580 with 4 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
